scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a publicly accessible customer churn prediction model deployed by a consumer bank. The attacker uses a model inversion attack to infer protected attributes like income and credit score from the model's predictions.
initial_goal: Infer customer demographics (age, income, credit score) from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A large consumer bank has deployed a machine learning model to predict customer churn using anonymized customer data. The model is accessible via a public API for research purposes.
